extendedInfo.description: You must be align a min of five balls of same kind in horizontal, vertical or diagonal. When you do, the balls explodes and free the board position, you obtain one point per ball when you align. You can obtain two points per ball if you align seven or more balls. To move a ball, click on it and click on destination board position and press OK button. You can save (or not) your points in the score record table if your points is a record. The game finalize when the board is full. The winner is whoever more points gets.
